p.s: The extract from the speech Remarks of president Barack Obama at student roundtable by Barack Obama, was published in April 2009 in Istanbul.
The speech is about the effects from doing a student exchange.
Barack Obamaseesees a lot of positive aspects in the young Americans.
He would like to connect young Americans to young people from all over the world to break down walls all over the world.
Doing a student exchange, many people come together and learn something about the other language and culture, so that they join together and that should happen all over the world.
